lead_paragraph: An article last Sunday about the presence of the retired cyclist Greg LeMond at this year’s Tour de France, a race he won three times, misstated the timing of his last extended visit to the event. It was in 1994, not in 1990. (Although LeMond’s third Tour title came in 1990, he competed in the race as late as 1994, when he withdrew during the sixth stage.).
